CHAT.comment: ESTHER HUI, ET AL., Petitioners v. YANIRA CASTANEDA, AS PERSONAL REPRESENTATIVE OF THE ESTATE OF FRANCISCO CASTANEDA, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:18 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ELAINE J. GOLDENBERG ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PRATIK A. SHAH ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CONAL DOYLE ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF ELAINE J. GOLDENBERG ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:10 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
